typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as integer,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSCINPUT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as integer,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
DSCINPUT select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> KeepImportantColumn
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}!=0) ~> notNullQuantity
KeepImportantColumn derive({Quantité en UV BL} = toDouble({Quantité en UV BL}),
		{Marque Code} = toDouble({Marque Code}),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> columnFormat
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})>0) ~> pieceDetache
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}==0) ~> nullQuantity
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})==0) ~> notPieceDetache
notPieceDetache filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
uniquePOSid filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join(toFloat({Agence Code}) == toFloat(POSid),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoinWithOrga
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOuter
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article_right = reference,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(columnFormat@year == RenameColumn@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article_right, " ", ""))),replace(Article_right, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerVentesDirecte
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(columnFormat@year == RenameColumn@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article_right, " ", ""))),replace(Article_right, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftVentesDirectes
window1 derive(ecart = toDouble(qte_cumul)-toDouble({Qté vente directe}),
		signe = iif(toDouble(qte_cumul)-toDouble({Qté vente directe}) <=0 , 0, 1)) ~> removeQuantityVenteDirecte
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		year = columnFormat@year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
fullLeftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(RenameColumn@year) || isNull(Article_right) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerLeft
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year = columnFormat@year,
		month,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
fullLeftUnion select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Marque DESC},
		sous_famille = {Sous Famille},
		reference = {Référence Article Fournisseur},
		agence_code = {Agence Code},
		departement_id = {Département ID},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
dropColumns2 derive(departement_id = toDouble(''),
		prix_unitaire_std = toDouble(''),
		distributeur = "DSC") ~> Addcolumn
organisation aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		POSSAMidString = first(POSSAMidString),
		HubSAPid = first(HubSAPid),
		BrandID = first(BrandID)) ~> uniquePOSid
Addcolumn, dropColumns union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
select1 window(over(year,
		POSSAMidString,
		reference = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", ""))),
	asc(month, true),
	qte_cumul = sum({Quantité en UV BL})) ~> window1
InnerVentesDirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year = columnFormat@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
removeQuantityVenteDirecte window(over(year,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur}),
	asc(month, true),
	signe_cumul = sum(signe)) ~> window2
window2 derive({Quantité en UV BL} = iif( signe_cumul <1,0, iif (signe_cumul ==1 , toInteger(ecart), toInteger( {Quantité en UV BL})   ) )) ~> derivedColumn1
pieceDetache sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_PIECE_DETACHEE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DSCPieceDetache
nullQuantity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputNullQuantity
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> preparedDSC
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> orgaNotFound
